div.pre: 155 Greece, central?, 1884 (458) Burial: 300-250 B.C. (Oeconomides, Hackens) Contents: 48 AR Athens: tetradr. Disposition: Athens Svoronos, Ath√®nes, pl. 32, 15-42 Noe gives the date as 1892 ? The hd. reached the museum at that time but came to the Dept. of Antiquities in 1884
